author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one at B&H: https://lon.tv/3cxb1 (compensated affiliate link) - I am slowly upgrading my home network with some new hardware. My latest upgrade is to a new $99 Unifi U7 Lite Wi-Fi 7 access point. See more networking : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsjVNQfNZwRHgB0CESn9UVJ and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

title: Unifi U7 Lite Review - $99 Wi-Fi 7 Access Point Reaches 1 Gigabit Speeds
